payload.content: Create a database migration system for SQLite
Created migrate.py with up/down migration support. Migrations stored in migrations/ directory as numbered SQL files. Includes rollback capability and migration status tracking.
Add a seed command to populate test data
Added seed.py with factory functions for User, Post, and Comment models. Generates realistic test data using Faker. Run with: python seed.py --count 100
Now create an API endpoint to query migration status
Added GET /api/migrations endpoint that returns current version, pending migrations, and last applied timestamp. Protected with admin-only authentication.
